Constructor Detail

SmsTransitServiceProvider

public SmsTransitServiceProvider(int clockFormat,
                                 ConnectionInfo imap,
                                 ConnectionInfo smtp,
                                 String subsOutputFile)
                          throws MessagingException,
                                 TransformerConfigurationException
Creates a transit SMS service with the specified properties.

Parameters:
clockFormat - The format to display times in. Anything other than 24 assumes the default 12-hour format.
imap - Information required to connect to the IMAP mail server.
smtp - Information required to connect to the SMTP mail server.
subsOutputFile - Subscription output file path.
Throws:
MessagingException - If there is a problem connecting to the remote service or in the event that the server could not authenticate the connection or the required folder(s) could not be opened/accessed.
TransformerConfigurationException - If an output XML file could not be properly configured and set up to output the subscription list.
Method Detail

run

public void run()
